metadata.title: CVE-2020-28896 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Mutt before 2.0.2 and NeoMutt before 2020-11-20 did not ensure that$ssl_force_tls was processed if an IMAP server's initial server responsewas invalid. The connection was not properly closed, and the code couldcontinue attempting to authenticate. This could result in authenticationcredentials being exposed on an unencrypted connection, or to amachine-in-the-middle.

criterions.comment: mutt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
